document_data.name: Rahmah al-Zahir
document_data.mainbody: Sitt '''Rahmah al-Zahir''' was the [[Khalil al-Assad al-Zahir|Grand Caliph]]'s favorite maternal aunt in [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities:
Rahmah was a member of the [[Magical Legion]] but spent too much time in politics to fully develop her power.

Her magical training was just an elaborate ruse to disguise her true calling as the Grandmother of the [[Soft Whisper]]. Rahmah and the Soft Whisper made sure that other [[Zakharan]] rulers who did not work to further the Grand Caliph's policies were visited by [[Holy slayer]]s.
document_data.Possessions: Much of her outward magical prowess was courtesy of a ''[[ring of spell storing]]'' supplied by the [[Alyana al-Azzazi|Grand Vizier]].
document_data.Relationships: Rahmah was lifelong friends with the Grand Vizier Alyana al-Azzazi.
document_data.History: Rahmah studied at the magical university at [[Qadib]].
